title: Senior C++ Software Engineer - Chip Design Tools
jobSummary: NVIDIA is seeking a Senior C++ Software Engineer to join our Chip Design Tools team. In this role, you will develop and enhance software tools that improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our chip design process.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain C++ software tools for chip design.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand design requirements.
Optimize software performance for large-scale chip design projects.
Ensure software quality through comprehensive testing and code reviews.
Stay updated with industry trends and integrate relevant technologies.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
5+ years of experience in C++ software development.
Strong understanding of data structures and algorithms.
Experience with software development tools and methodologies.
